bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, uniquley shaped tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

Specialized Roubaix Gel wrap w/ neoprene pads
Shimano Dura-Ace STI, Flight Deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
